articles.title: Galaxy S21 vs. iPhone 12 specs: Samsung may have beaten Apple this time - CNET
articles.description: Samsung has slashed prices of its Galaxy S21 lineup, but will that give it an edge over the iPhone 12 family? Here's how the Galaxy S21 stacks up against the iPhone 12.
articles.content:
Samsung's new lineup includes (from left) the $800 Galaxy S21, $1,000 Galaxy S21 Plus and $1,200 Galaxy S21 Ultra.

articles.title: CES 2021's coolest gadgets: Rollable phones, giant TVs, $16000 bathtub and more - CNET
articles.description: CES may be virtual this year, but there's no shortage of nifty devices. Here's what we've loved so far.
articles.content: The Lenovo ThinkBook Plus Gen 2 i is another updated dual-display work laptop. It features an E Ink touchscreen display embedded in the lid, so you can check on your work without actually opening the… [+511 chars]
